TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It is an R/C helicopter that is as big as a wallet.

I wish that Eeloo was made of vanilla ice-cream.

Granted... but you are now massively lactose intolerant...

I wish I had a Tardis...

Granted, but people keep filling it with trash, causing it to catch on fire.

I wish we have a dedicated sci-fi/sci-fantast channel on digital TV.

Granted, but for the first six months is a non-stop My Little Pony marathon!

I wish for a cold and cloudy day...

Welcome to the north pole.

I wish that I had a dinosaur dragon buddy named Scott Manley so that we could go and slay all the evil stuffs in the world.

All I can say is: You're going to have an Intense Dragon Adventure.

I wish for a fire alarm.

Granted, but it always goes off, ruining your hearing forever, making you unable to listen to anyone, even your GPS, so you get horribly lost, miss the speed limit sign on an unoccupied road that says 25 and instead go 50. The police chases you, but since you can't hear his siren, you don't pull over, which lands you in jail in a part of the country where no one knows or cares about you.

I wish my computer was fast. At all.

Granted. Your computer runs a marathon with its new bionic legs and runs off a cliff.

I wish that I get to go to Mars. Alive.

You were not smart enough to say anything about getting back, so you stay there. Alone. Forever.

I wish my phone's battery never ran out.

Granted, it never runs out because the screen is fried.

I wish to go home.

Granted, but your home is burnt to the ground. Hehe

I wish the next person to post would turn into a harmless black ant on the Mun.

The battery runs... into your body, dealing a fatal electric dose.

Lemme be more specific;

I want a Mil mi-17.

9 minutes ago, Dobelong said:

The battery runs... into your body, dealing a fatal electric dose.

Lemme be more specific;

I want a Mil mi-17.

Somebody's a tad late... And also an ant on the Mun!

Granted. It explodes and kills you. 

I wish the world was perfect.

Edited June 30, 2016 by Mycroft

16 minutes ago, Mycroft said:

Somebody's a tad late... And also an ant on the Mun!

Granted. It explodes and kills you. 

I wish the world was perfect.

Granted, but you were never born in the perfect world

I wish I had friends

Edited June 30, 2016 by AeroAviation

Granted. Your friends now mooch off of you for money and other gains.

I wish that I had a space station in orbit.

Granted, but your space station dips into the atmosphere, deorbiting and crashing. Fortunately for you, it had escape pods.

I wish my Jool mission would prove successful

It's a Jool mission, so all your craft plunge into Jool.

(I was ninja'd last time)

I want an mil V-12, shipped directly from Russia.

Edited June 30, 2016 by Dobelong

1 hour ago, Dobelong said:

It's a Jool mission, so all your craft plunge into Jool.

(I was ninja'd last time)

I want an mil V-12, shipped directly from Russia.

Granted, the ship however is the Maya-guez

I wan nothing.

41 minutes ago, PB666 said:

Granted, the ship however is the Maya-guez

I wan nothing. 

Granted, but nothing happened.

I want world peace.

Granted, but you must relocate the entire human population to Nix for it to happen. You are the sole individual in charge of this operation. If there are still any humans on Earth in 2101, everyone will wage total war on everyone else until they all die.

I wish for what I want but cannot have to be accessible.

Edited July 1, 2016 by cubinator

Granted, but you are only able to access it a millisecond before you die.

I wish for Bop to crash into Jool to destroy what remains of the Kraken.

Granted but the other kraken escaped 

I wish for an awesome, incorruptible sports car.

Granted. You receive the exact car you want, but it's a lesser-liked Hot Wheels model. No collector value.

 

I wish for a good breakfast this morning.

Somebody is eating good breakfast in Madagascar today.

I wish for my Moho lander to fail.

Granted, but your crew capsule survives, leaving all Kerbals to die of heatstroke.

I wish that the Outer Planets Mod was stock.

Edited July 1, 2016 by Vysionone
dammit autocorrect
